page.title: 05BOROUGHBRIDGE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Boroughbridge Sports Centre is a place for all the family.There is something on every night for children and adults.There is a large area inside and out for a variety of sports which iclude-:squash,badminton,cricket,footb all,tennis,netball,rollerskating,hocke y,superbounce,and trampoline.There is a terrfic amount of equipment for all of the sports.There are footballs, rounders bats,rackets,wickets,football nets,turtles,rollerskates and boots, shuttlecocks and more.The sports centre is local and everyone is welcome.There is a sitting area upstairs and a little bar where you can relax and have a drink.The most popular sport is the superbounce that is up on Wednesday nights at the seven to fourteen club.
